words.def: any of numerous agile ruminants related to sheep but having a beard and straight horns
a one-piece cloak worn by men in ancient Rome
come into the possession of something concrete or abstract
a label written or printed on paper, cardboard, or plastic that is attached to something to indicate its owner, nature, price, etc.
provide with clothes or put clothes on
annual grass of Europe and North Africa
an adherent of any branch of Taoism
a time for working (after which you will be relieved by someone else)
a highly unstable radioactive element (the heaviest of the halogen series)
a hard grey lustrous metallic element that is highly resistant to corrosion
Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
